thread.section_title: Clanwarz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Clanwarz | www.clanwarz.com
thread.title: Mark Rienstra

author: Mark Rienstra
title: Mark Rienstra
text:
I have had a few issues with the server such as a hacker trying yo steal my account and setting up sinus music bot, but as soon as I called in their help they immediately were on top of it, they deliver top quality servers for an affordable price and on top of that the service they deliver is ultimately great!
I have never had such a good experience hosting a server any where other than ClanWarz!
If you're looking for an affordable great quality server and service I recommend you to host it at ClanWarz.
